@cnmkerkyra136

wifi & 3g/4g must be turned off before 1st launch, and the game files must be in the proper directory. if you don't follow the instructions carefully it won't work.
Does the file have to go on the phone s internal memory or can it go on the SD card?Thanks for the help and the upload BobbitGamez.Really appreciate it.

1. extract main.100.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM4HM.obb with 7zip
2. rename folder to com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM4HM
3. copy to /Android/data/
3. install APK
3. use lucky patcher to remove licence verification
4. run the game
